platform_specific.cons: I didn't use the software long enough to dislike something about it.  However, sometimes the software could be more customisable.

platform_specific.cons: Non-coordination between selling and service and accounts teams. Poor customer service repeatedly. Management is least bothered. They block service in the middle due to non coordination at their end. Sales guys tell you something and service guys something else.
platform_specific.pros: It has a mobile app and it has a pipeline feature

platform_specific.cons: le manque de jobboards, la diffusion est inefficace.
platform_specific.pros: L'ergonomie et le design ce sont les points forts.

platform_specific.cons: The career page itself does the job, but it lacks some flexibility to make it look great.You can't set a job as "remote" for instance, or open in multiple locations. We have several offices, and some roles are location-indifferent, so we'd like to show it's open in multiple locations. Instead, we have to duplicate it which is very inconvenient, doesn't look good on the page, and also we can't have an overview of candidate across the duplicated roles.
platform_specific.pros: Recruitee is pretty easy to use, and the team was onboarded with no problem...

platform_specific.cons: It's a bit difficult and time consuming to setup perfectly, but once setup, all the time invested into setup pays back quickly.
platform_specific.pros: Recruitee helps us to streamline our recruiting and onboarding process...

platform_specific.cons: Nothing like that every thing in this portal is very impressive very good and easy to understand UI easy to use.
platform_specific.pros: Help us to find good and reliable Candidates for all the skills...

platform_specific.cons: When we tried to cancel our plan, they still billed us for additional month saying we did not cancel. You need to go through several pages do cancel your subscription and although your impression will be that you are cancelled, most likely you will be charged still.  When we discovered this one day later, they still refused to give us refund. I would avoid adding your credit card here.

platform_specific.cons: I don't have any dislikes at this point, the software is fantastic.

platform_specific.cons: The reporting feature does not work for us as we are used to a continuous hiring cycle and we do not close a job after hiring someone. This reporting feature isn't as important to us currently so it's by no means a deal breaker
platform_specific.pros: Recruitee seems to have been build with the end-users in mind...

platform_specific.cons: Recruitee is volop in ontwikkeling.  Er is een mooie basis, maar qua extra features is er nog meer te halen. Het team is daar volop mee bezig! Dus komt het helemaal goed!

platform_specific.cons: Sometimes links are coming down I don't know why but overall i really like recruitee app. There is no technical error.
platform_specific.pros: Recruitee is the desktop and app software for jobs seekers and employers...

platform_specific.cons: I think reporting could be better - and intergrations. I don't have a full recruiter seat on LinkedIn so it's a pain that I can't exercise full use of Recruitee & LinkedIn. So much information gets lost/becomes manual work because the two systems don't speak to each other. Subsequently, reporting is not accurate if I forget to log something from LI into Recruitee.

platform_specific.cons: Nog geen zaken gevonden waar ik niet blij mee zou zijn, dus ga zo door!

platform_specific.cons: The only thing that I see that could change is, it would be nice to have the phone number go in with the right format. I have to always out the (-) in between the numbers so they can be read easier when dialing the candidate.
